name: pbkdf2sha512
description: node crypto's async pbkdf2 promisified and with sane defaults

scripts.predist: mkdirp build && rimraf build/* && mkdirp dist && rimraf dist/*
scripts.example: npm run example:bundle && npm run example:serve
scripts.example:bundle: browserify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib -t uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ common-shakeify -v ] | uglifyjs -c -m toplevel -o spec/example/index.js
scripts.example:bundle:watch: watchify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib -o spec/example/index.js --debug -v
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:ci:coverage && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage -t html && npm run test:coverage:serve
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci:coverage && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly
scripts.test:web: npm run test:web:bundle && npm run test:web:serve
scripts.test:web:bundle: browserify spec/*.spec.ts -p [ tsify -p spec ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib -t uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ common-shakeify -v ] | uglifyjs -c -m toplevel -o spec/web/index.spec.js
scripts.uglify:index: uglifyjs build/index.js -c toplevel -m toplevel --define process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" -o dist/index.js
scripts.uglify:utils: uglifyjs build/utils.js -c toplevel -m toplevel --define process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" -o dist/utils.js
